pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Good Call</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Well done. Right now, the best way to engage Dr. Bennett and demonstrate the value that you bring is to link to how Dr. Bennett can help address and control side effects. Ensuring Dr. Bennett understands the side effect profile for your own product, as well as the side effectsâ€™ impact on patient outcomes will strengthen your relationship with Dr. Bennett and the practice as a whole.</welcomeText>
